RMtools_1D.models_ns package¶

Submodules¶

RMtools_1D.models_ns.m1 module¶

RMtools_1D.models_ns.m1.model(pDict, lamSqArr_m2)¶

Simple Faraday thin source.

RMtools_1D.models_ns.m11 module¶

RMtools_1D.models_ns.m11.model(pDict, lamSqArr_m2)¶

Two separate Faraday components, averaged within same telescope beam (i.e., unresolved), with a common Burn depolarisation term.

RMtools_1D.models_ns.m2 module¶

RMtools_1D.models_ns.m2.model(pDict, lamSqArr_m2)¶

Single Faraday component with Burn depolarisation

RMtools_1D.models_ns.m3 module¶

RMtools_1D.models_ns.m3.model(pDict, lamSqArr_m2)¶

Two separate Faraday components, averaged within same telescope beam (i.e., unresolved), with a common Burn depolarisation term.

RMtools_1D.models_ns.m4 module¶

RMtools_1D.models_ns.m4.model(pDict, lamSqArr_m2)¶

Two separate Faraday components, averaged within same telescope beam (i.e., unresolved), with individual Burn depolarisation terms.
